website_summaries.verdict: These aren't the best color-changing bulbs that I've tested, but they offer very decent value, making them a good budget pick.
pros: Sengled's newest color-changing smart bulbs are more budget-friendly than the competition, and they offer full compatibility with Alexa and Google Assistant
The app tracks the real-time power draw of each bulb at each setting, which is a nice touch
cons: Though accurate, the colors aren't as bright as you'll get with Lifx or Hue, and the app is a bit clunkier to use, too
You can't use the bulbs with IFTTT or Apple HomeKit, either

customer_reviews.title: Neat little addition to Echo Plus
customer_reviews.text: So I recently added to my Echo universe with an Echo Plus, and decided to take the plunge and spend $20 on a light bulb, ha. Anyway, it's pretty amazing that you get so many colors, and ease-of-use, with these 2 gadgets. It took less than 30 seconds for it to all be synced up. I've already ordered a 2nd one for the other end-table. Watch the video for a quick demostration, and good luck!
customer_reviews.author: wavxwizard

customer_reviews.title: Better than Hue
customer_reviews.text: I love sengled. I’ve been using them since when they first came out. This was my alternative to Hue but then I like them not only for the price but the quality. Alexa integration is super easy. Brightness is exactly what I was looking for. I have 3 of these in the house and I use them on regular basis for my daughter in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Drknght

customer_reviews.title: Paired perfectly & natively with SmartThings!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cool bulbs! Paired perfectly & natively with SmartThings. My kids love being able to set the color. I have one for our movie/play room for a non-distracting but usable light while watching movies, and also so they can put it into party mode (used some custom webCORE code). The other is great for warning notifications (e.g. turn red when garage door is open, flashed red/blue when the alarm is going off, etc). They're a hair more than other connected bulbs, but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Impressive product !
customer_reviews.text: By having this Sengled smart bulb installed in the house, not only I get to adjust the lighting (don’t need to install dimmer, ever) but also add strong element to complete my smart home system, great companion. I’ve crossed reference on Bluetooth speaker light bulb in between brands, Philips Hue/Lightstory/LightME E27, turned out Sengled offers more with reasonable price point, Pro: easy to install, reasonable price, App controllable (now is SengledHome as the App to consolidate all devices), very energy efficient, Con: none so far I would recommend this product to friends and family, Sengled offers good soultion.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Wu

customer_reviews.title: Nice integration with Alexa and Smartthings
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs were great as they didn't require the Sengled hub given I already had Samsung Smartthings hub. Color integration with Alexa works well also...however, the Alexa integration has preset colors only instead of a color wheel or ability to choose/set a particular RGB. This is minor given I can use SmartThings to choose colors, but a RGB ability may be a nice advanced feature. Very good look though for the function provided.
customer_reviews.author: jdub

customer_reviews.title: Works Well with Alexa!
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs work perfectly with Alexa. You can set many colors by voice, or use the app to set specific colors. You can adjust the brightness with voice commands, too. I use these way more than I thought I ever would. I like to set two bulbs on the same lamp to different colors at the same time. On occasion, the bulbs need to be reset in order to communicate with Alexa again - turn off the light switch and turn it back on again resets everything. I would/will buy these bulbs again. I would recommend these bulbs to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rymonster

customer_reviews.title: Love them !
customer_reviews.text: Bought the two pack kit (with Sengled hub), but managed to connect them to Wink Hub2 as generic Zigbee device and have full control and can even control (brightness and color) both of them at the same time using the light group function in Wink app! Love them !!
customer_reviews.author: Cornelis Klomp

customer_reviews.title: I love them BUT
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are already giving me problems, and they've only been used for two days. Three out of the four bulbs are fine but there is one that doesn't change color with the others. When we check Alexa it shows that bulb 4 isn't connected. It seems like it will be an everyday problem with that one since the past two days we've had to reconnect it. Seems easier to just use the light switch and keep it in one color. If that is the case then we overpaid for "regular type" of light bulbs. Uodate (01/24/19): My fiance contacted them and they mailed us a new one that works great.
customer_reviews.author: ReynaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs, mediocre app.
customer_reviews.text: Color range is very good and the price is best in class! The lights are responsive and as bright as expected. I knocked off a star because the app isn't great. For example, the lights should change color in real time as I drag my finger around the color graph. In reality, the lights only change color after lifting you finger, making it hard to get the exact color you want.
customer_reviews.author: Jerk Juggernaut

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I really did not like these. Got them to replace a color changing bulb that we purchased from China. It was a super cheap bulb that you control by a remote and can also be turned into a strobe light with the remote. I thought because these bulbs were so expensive they would be better. I was wrong. Our cheap china bulb looks better. It's nice to be able to control it with my phone, but that's basically the same as controlling it with my remote. It also cannot be turned into a colorful strobe light. I see how this can be great for others, but I will stick to my cheap made in China bulb for like 8 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good full spectrum bulbs for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like theses bulbs and the output and color is pretty good over the 2 months I've owned them. I control them through the Smarthings app and set color and intensity just fine. That said, I cannot get the Sengled app to connect to them at all. Maybe it's me, maybe not. The only feature that I find I would like is a way to pair 2 or more bulbs so that changing color and/or intensity can be accomplished in one shot instead of adjusting each bulb separately. Otherwise, some fine bulbs for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sponge

customer_reviews.title: Constantly disconnecting. Reconnection is a pain!
customer_reviews.text: When the work, I like them. However, they NEVER seem to work properly. At least once a month one of the bulbs will disconnect. Then when I try to reconnect the bulb it repeatedly fails. I have to reset the bulb completely and reset all of its settings. Even then, it still takes multiple attempts to reconnect. If these things could stay connected and working for more than a couple weeks I would rate them so much higher.
customer_reviews.author: Chaplain Grill Sergeant

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pair with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Sengled bulb since I have an Echo Plus with Zigbee hub. I got tired of my other hub-free smart bulbs that constantly get disconnected from my network. Installation was a breeze and my Echo Plus recognized it right away. I didn't bother installing the Sengled app because I am using the Alexa on my phone already. Alexa integration is seamless. I placed this bulb on a bedroom lamp. This bulb is as bright as Philips, but not as expensive. Color is comparable with Philips also. Overall I'm happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Brandon F.

customer_reviews.title: A great smart bulb
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 of these bulbs in use at the moment, and I'm really happy with them. They're about as bright as a 60W conventional bulb, and you can choose daylight or soft white (etc). But where they really shine (pun intended) is that you can dim them without flicker, and set them to any color. When set to bold colors, they are not as bright, but the colors are great. I use an echo plus as my hub, and they work anywhere in a large house, so range of the zigbee control shouldn't be an issue. Overall, I have only good things to say about them, I haven't yet discovered any negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Rob T

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Yellow Alexa controlled porch light
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our back porch light to set to yellow to repel bugs. Dissatisfied with our Osram Lightify bulbs that did not work well with Alexa. Heard good things about Sengled through the Hubitat community. Screwed in and instantly found with Hubitat hub. Then integrated with Alexa skill in Hubitat to control with voice through Alexa. Set color to a yellow to repel bugs for our back porch light. We have routine set so we say Dog's out and it turns on porch light and Dog's in turns off porch light. Really enjoy the smart home features of smart bulbs and Alexa integration.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H NRH Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool For Disabled Folks
customer_reviews.text: So far, so awesome! Works as advertised, set up and software is a breeze. I haven't gotten my echo Dot yet but even without it works great. I have the hub connected via WiFi and the software on my phone controls the lights without delay. The colors are really cool. So far I have just one room set up but am adding another tomorrow. I was recently severely disabled in a motorcycle accident, losing an arm and leg. So this? It's not just fun but a small miracle that brings light into my life again. Literally! Just fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: Sorry can't help
customer_reviews.text: Purchase went fine. Installation terrible. Iphone and Philips Hue could not find lights. Called Sengled support. Explained the issue. Was advised I would need to scan or manually enter the codes for each bulb on the Sengled app, which I was required to download. Explained that the bulbs were installed 20' up and if I had to go back up I would just return them. Rep said sorry can't help you without the code. Seems that one note with the lights stating to pre copy the code in case it's needed would be better than getting returns and bad press. Ill stick with Philips brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the idea, Probably won’t buy this brand again
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs are great, my kids have so much fun using Alexa to change the colors, they are really great as night lights and regular lights because of the color and brightness adjustment. My only issue, and it’s a big issue is that they sometimes stop communicating with Alexa and it’s a pain to get them talking again. You have to scan the QR code on the bulbs to reconnect them to their hub and get the hub connected to Alexa. This is awkward especially if you have one of your lights in a sconce 10 feet up the wall, above a cast iron spiral staircase.
customer_reviews.author: Billy &Heather

customer_reviews.title: Home Light Automation Done Right - Dimmable and Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our smart home automation for our daughters' rooms. They absolutely love them because of the fun colors and the fact that they can just ask Google to turn them on and off. Besides the beautiful array of colors, they are dimmable, making the room just light enough for perfect and peaceful sleep. Also, they are relatively easy to set up. We already had the hub from the previous non-color lights from the same brand, so we just had to reset the bulbs to link them to the hub. To do so, cycle power on and off 10 times quickly and the lights connect immediately.
customer_reviews.author: The Allen Family

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Hue alternative
customer_reviews.text: These are the best Hue alternative out there! These lights work seamlessly with Alexa and have the same capabilities as the more expensive bulbs out there. Sengled offers an exclusive line of lights and it doesn’t look like they’re going anywhere soon so I feel comfortable with the purchase and the availability of additional products. I love the Wi-Fi bulbs the only problem is if you are going to a smart home environment Wi-Fi bulbs will clog your Internet but if you use multiple lights through a bridge,The bridge uses less Wi-Fi giving you a better Wi-Fi experience in your home and the convenience of having up to 60 lights connected.
customer_reviews.author: antcin307

customer_reviews.title: Beware this company is shady and negligent.
customer_reviews.text: If sengled severs go down you will be left in the dark. The gave no updates on any social platforms for why or when this issue will be fixed. 4 plus hours with no lights, just expensive paperweights in my lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Kanvis

customer_reviews.title: Love the dimming options.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I just wish I could create my own colors and didn’t need the hub to use them. I also wish the packaging had the QR codes for them on the packaging so that if I need to do something that requires it, I won’t have to take the bulb out of the light socket to scan it. I do love the dimmer feature. Setting a dim light that works as a nightlight and doesn’t disturb everyone is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Melton

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs!!
customer_reviews.text: I already had a couple of smart bulbs attached to my echo plus/alexa system, but they were only the white ones. I had a couple of empty sockets in my living room, so I put these in... Wow! They went in easy, and Alexa picked them right up.! They are super fun! I haven't played with everything they can do yet, but it's great to be able to tell alexa 'Alexa, Set the TV Room to Movie Mode' or 'Alexa, set the TV room to RED' and she does it! The kids think it's great as well. We are looking into how we can make alexa change the lights to react to the show we are watching now! Great lights!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: easy to sync, uses different app or hub
customer_reviews.text: This light bulb is great and has a great color -- both warm or white light and color. Easy to sync with the app as you just scan the QR code so it's much easier than other bulbs to set up. It uses the Sengled app so different than my other smart products so I did have to install a different app. It can integrate into Alexa, but I didn't realize the bulb needs the Zigabee hub so great for Zigabee users, not great for those that don't or use Alexa or the Amazon Alexa as their primary hub. High quality bulb, doesn't sync with my smart home app and not as easy to use for Zigabee non users.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs turn on by themselves at random times
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and they both randomly turn on by themselves at random times and it's not because they are receiving firmware updates. They are connected via SmartThings and OTA updates are disabled. All I need is my bedroom lamp to come on by itself in the middle of the night. What kind of crap is that. C'mon, stop shipping buggy products.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Like the function, but durability is questionable
customer_reviews.text: We like the functionality and concept of an LED you can program and set looks with, via phone app. And being able to change them away from the house is pretty cool! But this product appears to become defective after a couple of weeks of regular use. We haven’t had any issues with connectivity, but when it’s steadily on, after a while it will begin to flicker. Maybe it’s bad luck, we’ve had this problem twice now. Gonna try to replace one more time and hope for the best. The picture shows the Sengled bulb in the overhead fan, in deep blue, in conjunction with our fireplace purple and orange string lights.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: The color of brightness...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Sengled’s Smart LED light bulbs for a while now and absolutely love them. I just wish I would had discovered them earlier, it would had saved me a lot of money purchasing switches. Having this lights in all parts of my home, I can set whatever mood I like. The colors are bright and clearly shines the rooms indoors and outside in my lanai. I highly recommend these smart lights.
customer_reviews.author: calpr

customer_reviews.title: Poor range, poor integration
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two bulbs, despite having good line of sight and being near one another, only one stays connected to the hub consistently. Either these are not handing off signal or they have really poor range. The one that is consistently connected sometimes does not turn on/off with the SmartThings automation I have set up. The app will indicate it is on after the automation runs, but it is not. This issue is intermittent and took long enough to identify that I can no longer return them. Would not buy again, wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nuckolls

customer_reviews.title: Needs a hub, But good
customer_reviews.text: These lights are good. a little more dim then i hoped for, but what we are using them for, its not a deal breaker. Took us a little while to get them hooked up correctly and working correctly, but once we did, everything seems fine. Hope they last for a while! I do love being able to use an app to control the lighting, especially for the lamps that are across the room. i also like not having to use an enabled plug, because sometimes, there just is not enough room for a plug, this solves that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of light.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a colored light bulb to set the mood for a party I was hosting. I wasn’t sure which color would work best with my theme so I decided to try this multicolored smart bulb. I’m so glad I did. This little build threw out just the right amount of light for my setting and it really made the colors of my party favors pop. What I really loved was that I could go unto my Alexa app and create a A routine for the colors to change every 30 minutes. I love this little smart bulb. I will most likely be buying another one for my daughters room.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Recommended! Good performance and quality, but you need a Sengler hub to interface with Alexa.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I ordered a set if four bulbs, probably missed the part in the Amazon writeup about it needing the hub. Ordered a new Alexa Studio recently. It needs you to buy a hub to interface between the bulbs and alexa, but with these bulbs at $22/apiece even buying the hub you’ll come out ahead compared to Phillips, etc. i’ve been very impressed, and the bulbs do a good job in terms of accurately replicating the color you’re looking for. We enjoy changing the bulbs to match what we’re watching (i.e. red & yellow when watching hunt for Red October, etc etc fun times...
customer_reviews.author: HomeTekkie

customer_reviews.title: poor connection with HA and HUSBZB-1
customer_reviews.text: I have a strong, reliable mesh network setup with multiple routers. Home Assistant added this just fine to zigbee2mqtt, but it's super laggy and eventually loses connection - even with strong link quality. I tried different bulbs, and had the same issue. Returned it and bought the Inovelli RGB zwave bulb, and have zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: I am really liking this bulb. It requires the Sengled Hub or any other hub to setup because it uses Zigbee instead of WiFi. But, it is really easy to set up. The Sengled app did not cause me any issues like many mention on the app stores. It made integrating the bulb with my Alexa and Google Home very easy. The bulb has good brightness and is a wide color range. I have set it up right now to wake me in the morning like sunlight and it has been working very well. I will most probably buy more of these bulbs for the rest of the lights in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Aakaash Jois

customer_reviews.title: Givith of life
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure what I was doing with my life before getting these light bulbs. The only thing I wish is that the lighter colors were more rich and true to tone- but they are still the bomb. Very rich in all colors you could possibly fathom & are for sure a great good mood/ ambiance enhancer without fully having to worry about it burning your house down like a candle might. They’re kind of a real b*tch to reset if you don’t figure it out right away and I also wish they were a tad cheaper or at least came in a larger bundle- but for now we will enjoy the three we have!
customer_reviews.author: Hellachels

customer_reviews.title: Great Lighting Addition to House
customer_reviews.text: I installed four Sengled smart lights and the Sengled hub. It was fairly easy, but I needed a wee bit of phone support when I was connecting the hub to the light bulbs. That went well after the customer service rep recommended that I set up a light near the hub and connect all four bulbs in one spot. Then I moved the bulbs to their correct locations, and they worked fantastically. I love the ability to set up different scenes and to program the on/off times. I only wish the bulbs could be programmed to change colors or blink for special occasions. Otherwise, I highly recommend the Sengled products.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Roderick

customer_reviews.title: Exact same bulb, different form factor
customer_reviews.text: Nothing different about these from the main-line Sengled bulb, other than the form factor. It looks better in the fixtures, and that's what was needed. It does kind of suck, however, that they aren't available in the same deals or bundles as the regular color bulbs, and thus will end up costing you more. Hoping Sengled makes a greater variety of form factors in the future, because I'd be happy to replace every bulb in the house with their products. The color reproduction and Alexa integration are as good as Philips Hue (I'm familiar, I have a buddy down the street who's whole house is on that platform), with a much more reasonable price (which matters as you scale).
customer_reviews.author: Brandon C Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great light - great price - easy set up - works well with Smartthings
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bulb that would work with Smartthings hub and app as I did not want/need yet another app to control a "one-off" addition to my smart home set up. It took about 30 seconds to add to Smartthings (using the "Add A Thing" feature). It recognized the bulb immediately and I am able to control the brightness and color through the Smarthings app. And by extension, it works with Alexa since I have Smartthings integrated with Alexa. Very nice bulb at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: rgd18

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with zigbee2mqtt
customer_reviews.text: Hub / Bulbs works without any issues, easy to setup, responsive and well supported by many controllers. The thing I will add more details is the great integration to a DIY system using a zigbee2mqtt bridge. Bulbs are perfectly supported, down to the firmware updates as Sengled release the updates publicly! Color, CCT, and brightness changes were done without issues, no lag. Perfect to replace Hue lights, similar to IKEA Tradfri support and quality.
customer_reviews.author: emc2

customer_reviews.title: EASY to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs (once I plugged in the hub) were automatically found by the sengled app on my phone AND my Google Home app. EASY. I have been having so much fun trying to "stump" the verbal light instructions, from chartreuse, to puce, to burnt umber...and more. I especially like the ability to verbally adjust the brightness. As I am disabled...these bulbs using verbal commands work GREAT! now if I could only get the lightbulbs to make my coffee!
customer_reviews.author: micki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I have to say when I was buying this I was a little skeptical because I've never heard of the brand but this light bulb was as good as the Philips hue bulbs It was easy to set up with the hub as well as had as many colors and setups as a Philips hues In fact it had a lot more different color combinations. I would recommend this bowl for anyone that doesn't want to pay the high prices for Philips hue but once the quality in a product as the Philips.
customer_reviews.author: Luis E.

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs!! Instructions could use some work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to pair with my existing hub. They work great with the hub they come with. However, when adding to another hub, the manufacturer has conflicting info on the included instructions and website. One says to flick the switch on and off 5 times to enter pairing mode, the other says 10. I only seemed to get it into pairing mode after nearly 15 times flicking switch on and off. Other than that, they are great bulbs with a huge set of preset colors and allows you to choose from an even larger amount if wanted
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Ones that work are excellent, horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the package of 4. The 3 that work are very nice, no annoying noise, nice operation. 1 of the bulbs was faulty. I tried to return through amazon but the only option was to return the whole pack, which I didn’t need to do. So I contacted Sengled directly, and I have been give the run around , answered at least 10 different questions, been ignored and then asked questions that have nothing to do with replacing the faulty bulb. It’s a shame cuz the ones that work are nice. But I don’t support companies like this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great color changing smart bulb with fast and easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my smart bulb for about a week now and I love it. Set up with my Alexa show was quick and easy and only took about a minute to install. The ability to turn my bedroom light on and off with a simple voice command is a great alternative to stumbling around in the dark looking for the light switch. I can even change the color of my bedroom according to my mood. I will definitely be purchasing more of these to place around the house.
customer_reviews.author: carol jakubus

customer_reviews.title: Great colored zigbee bulb to use with Smartthings
customer_reviews.text: I find that Zigbee and Z-wave smart bulbs tend to work better than wifi controlled bulbs. This is the cheapest Zigbee smartbulb I have found and it works great. There are no special third party apps required. It was easily recognized by Smartthings, and the Alexa integration works great. It is using the "ZigBee RGBW Bulb" device handler.
customer_reviews.author: CalifGuy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Can't live without.
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these bulbs! The adjustable shades of white make any space more attractive. There's a perfect shade for any room. And the adjustable dimness is super useful. The Alexa integration works great once it's set up. And the set-up is pretty simple, too. My only complaint is that adding a bulb seems to make the hub freak out for a while. I've added bulbs successfully. But after adding, the hub stops working until I've killed its power and then restarted it. Now that I know the trick, it's not a big deal. But, still a reason to dock a star.
customer_reviews.author: Amyrinthe

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & Bad
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a good alternative to philips hue, well there is a reason why these bulbs are cheaper. After a month, disconnected from Wink hub. Tried resetting but no good, would go into pairing mode but no longer connect with the hub. Very frustrating considering this is fairly new. Do yourself a favor and spend the extra money for good quality bulbs
customer_reviews.author: Rondon

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun and Super Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: The picture is of "Medium Purple" at 50% brightness. Look, this thing is so much fun. It's so easy to use and it was almost as easy to setup. All it took was screwing it in and then pairing with my Hub (coincidentally also Sengled and really good). Super easy to connect with the Google Home devices I already had. There are a lot of, virtually infinite, colors to customize it within the Sengled app and they're limited with the Google Home app, but there are still very many. Tl;dr: This thing is fun and super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The light is quite dim, it doesn't give 60W equivalent for sure. Maybe 40W. Even though it's ZigBee, you need to install their hub and app first for firmware update. Then I moved it successfully to my SmartThings hub and control using ST. Good quality and very responsive. There are some quirks, like if you try to set intensity and turn on, it will turn on first at whatever intensity it was before, then adjust. Same for color. Because of that, it's hard to use a wake up routine, unless you remember to dim it down before sleeping, otherwise you get a very bright light in the face before it starts dimming again.
customer_reviews.author: fmcf

customer_reviews.title: zigbee2mqtt full support
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bridge set a few weeks ago, and came back for one extra bulb. As stated in my bridge review the bulbs have full zigbee2mqtt support, even OTA updates. Overall these bulbs are very bright in white mode, and have soft RGB modes. Unless you really need a very bright color light, then you can get at least two of these for the price of one hue light! Overall similar to ikea models if you are familiar with these.
customer_reviews.author: emc2

customer_reviews.title: Great for outside door light
customer_reviews.text: I have this installed at our front door. It is cool to be able to have different colors based on the season. This year, during COVID isolation, we had the light set to blue to support our neighbors who work at a hospital less than 1/4 mile from us. Sever healthcare workers said they appreciated the thought. This bulb is cool!! (and it can be fun to surprise your neighbors by having it change color as they walk by- yes, I am a geek LOL)
customer_reviews.author: T. Bruce Robson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun Colors - But Not As Bright As Previous Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with these lights. It was really simple to install these lights with the second generation Echo with the built in Smart Hub. It gives me great peace of mind knowing that I don't have to rely on Sengled hubs and servers. These aren't as bright as previous versions of Sengled bulbs, but, I'm happy with my purchase. There are about 15 colors that you can change these to. I recommend setting them to "reading" in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Colin Hall

customer_reviews.title: All the colors of the rainbow.
customer_reviews.text: I already had the sengled hub and replaced one of the lights in my ceiling fan with one of these. It works about how I would have expected it to do. You can pick any color to change the light to and you can adjust the brightness. I like that there is a simple way to just go back to normal white. It is nice to listen to music with the room being a different shade. Did i need it no! Do I like it yes!
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great smart lights.
customer_reviews.text: These are great smart lights. They integrate right into our Google home. They are easy to control from anywhere with internet. Setting them up was easy, and the app was great to use as well. Change colors, change brightness, it is all good. LED's are definitely the wave of the future, and smart bulbs are leading that wave. It is great for decoration, and even security when away. I will be looking at some more of these bulbs down the road!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Larum

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bulbs!!
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are AWESOME!! I have 30+ smart bulbs connected to my Smartrhings system. I have bought many Phillips HUE bulbs, as I read that they are the best. Dont believe that!! These bulbs are less than half the price and the colors are 100% better than the Phillips bulbs. Colors are pure and rich, and very easy to set up in Smartthings. I highly recommend!! Hurry and buy them before everyone figures this out and Amazon goes up on them because of the thousands of orders for them. Once you buy 1 or 2 of these, you won't buy another HUE bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One was dead and the other worked for a while then died as well (disappointed)
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this set but it was an unpleasant experience when I tried to install and connect the bulbs with the hub and Alexa. It took a while even with resetting, and only one bulb worked, the other wouldn’t connect at all or turn on even manually. It didn’t take 2 months for the working bulb to stop working as well. Now they’re just back in their box. Guess I got a defective set. While only one bulb worked well for a while, I was happy with the color options and the mood it set, but it didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Nu!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for older, single-switch fans
customer_reviews.text: Second Sengled RGB bulb for us. They work flawlessly with SmartThings and Alexa. Our daughter’s room has an older, single-switch fan that she wanted to be able to control with Alexa like the rest of our lights. Paired the Sengled with SmartThings, and now she can turn her light off without pulling a chain. She loves the color range, but admittedly the SmartThings app can change to more colors than voice commands.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Same colors, lower price
customer_reviews.text: It works beautifully. I have it connected through a SmartThings Hub and controlling through Alexa. Works great to tell her whatever color you want. One thing I like is that when power is cut, it seems to default to whatever my last setting was. A lot of my other smart bulbs default to 100% brightness when turned off and on at the switch. Sometimes as I enter the room it’s easier to just flip the switch off and on than talking to Alexa, so it’s nice to have it come on at the lower brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Got these on cyber Monday as a Christmas gift for our girls. We placed them in two 2-bulb lamps. They look great. My girls love them. And they were easy to set up. Marking down because: 1. I have already had to reconnect one because it randomly stopped responding 2. I wish there were a setting to randomly change the light to create a “dance party” effect. Overall these are great and a fun addition to our home.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: would say definietly a competitive product
customer_reviews.text: I had to pick between Sengled Smart Light Bulbs and Philips Hue. considering the price of Philips hue, I picked the Sengled 3 bulb set with the hub (using outdoor) from Bestbuy, and the whole installation and set up was easy. The product is working great so far more than 2 months. Then I bought these newer bulbs which don't need a hub (using indoor). I would definitely recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dhiraj Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Light up my life!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 3 together one for my room and one for my extremely dark hallway. They are compatible with my google home and make turning on the lights super easy. It takes some pairing but that was easy and now I walk in without walking into anything! A definite plus in my books! I’m probably going to order more especially since it really was a better price than in stores!
customer_reviews.author: MAILE

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install and great price
customer_reviews.text: I have several Sengled products in my home and have always found them to be exceptional products and very price point competitive. These lamps are no exception. They installed quickly and were recognized by the hub right away. I had also purchased some other RGBW and warm white lamps and they were also easy to get up and running. What can I say, Great product, easy installation, easy customization and interface to my Alexia devices was simple.
customer_reviews.author: mr wilson

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and works, no issues
customer_reviews.text: It is not the brightest bulb, but it is a bulb great. For the price, this bulb is my go to for all of my lamps. I am slowly adding these bulbs to Smartthings and also connected to my Google Assistant and Amazon Echo devices. I use Smartthings because I can program routines in Smartthings for simple automation and use Alexa for more complex automation. I have WIFI bulbs and while it works, the Sengled Zigbee bulbs is just a must better product. Inexpensive as well. I do not recommend the Sengled hub. I definitely recommend Smartthings with Sengled.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio and Serenity Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great color spectrum and a breeze to use.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this smart bulb. I’ve used other ones that were just WiFi and so I was skeptical about the hub. It tuned out to be extremely simple to set up and the reaction times are great. I also like the color spectrum. I assumed the light would be a bit carnivalesque but it actually works really well for watching movies or just fun lightning settings.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Simple to Setup
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my son's bedroom, primarily so I could turn his lights out after reading at bedtime without getting up right away and disrupting him. I went for these colorful ones rather than regular white to add some fun and I am so glad I did, he is having an awesome time with it. All I had to do was screw these in the regular receptacles and then follow the simple directions to sync it with his kids echo dot.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Works well along with Google Home system using the hub
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my guest toilet/bathroom along with the hub to work with my google home system. So far it really works well. It was easy to set up and there have been no issues with the connectivity. I was initally going to buy the normal smart bulb but I am glad now that I decided to buy a colored one instead as it helps change the ambience of the toilet/bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: They keep dropping offline
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 were able to connect with sengled. Three with Alexa, but if you turn the light south of they drop off sengled and one has dropped completely. You have to reset all unless you want to climb a 20 for ladder to keep removing the his ones so you don't reset them. To reset you switch the light on and off 10 times. This get old when you're doing it every few days.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: A great zigbee lightbulb
customer_reviews.text: I had been using various brands of zigbee lights over the years and it caused a lot of trouble with my zigbee mesh. Even when people weren't turning off the lights, the other lights would cause the mesh to be unstable. Sengled has taken the decision to exclude these light bulbs from the mesh which has made them excellent choices and after switching over to these, I've been able to have a strong home automation system (Hubitat). Compatibility is great with it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Beware: They can turn on automatically in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.text: I won’t recommend these lights. The brightness is less than a 7w normal LED lamp in white light mode. Worst part is it turns On automatically during mid night, it has happened with me a few times. I don't know whether there is a firmware bug or any other problem with them. Definitely, you don't want to wake up in the middle of the night due to a firmware bug. I am writing this review because it just woke me up from sleep due to this bug.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with home assistant
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the other sengled led bulb this one does not seem to work with homeassistant 0.80.1 I was able to configure the color when the bulb was in the same room but it no longer seems to work reliably. Resetting it helps for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew McHarg

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to pair with just a SmartThings Hub and GREAT support !!
customer_reviews.text: Great support: I emailed to confirm all I need is a smartthings up. They replied within 4 hours and they were right! Originally I didn't want a hub so I bought a wifi only bulb from another mfg. It was horrible - hard to pair (took 4 tries) and eventually lost connection to my network. So, I bought a smartthings up and I'm thrilled with it and thus decided on zigbee bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper alternative to Phillips Hue smart bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Three years ago, you'd have paid twice the amount for a smart bulb and it'll probably have been a Phillips Hue bulb. I like how other companies are able to get into the market and drive the price down. This smart bulb can be integrated into Amazon's Alexa voice activated smart home functions. I like it because I can change the ambient light to match the movie I'm watching or game I'm playing. Guests are always impressed by the wide range of colors the bulb can project. This smart bulb requires a hub though so be sure to purchase that as well.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fast response, bright light output, excellent connectivity!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t so certain about having to purchase a controller device with this bulb; luckily is connects better than the cheap Wifi bulbs I already had in the house! Great colors and brightness. Connects quickly and the response time is very fast when using voice controls. I’ll be purchasing more to use around the rest of the house!
customer_reviews.author: Knut Lovhoiden

customer_reviews.title: read the details and you'll be set!
customer_reviews.text: This hub and bulb set is exactly what I needed for the Amazon dot that we had. I thought I could do it without the hub at first, but the hub is important if you have an older alexa device. I found it worked best to hardwire the hub to our internet for the best connection. The colors are great and I love that I can adjust it on my phone. I think I might buy more bulbs!
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Phillips Alternative, tricky software but overall good product
customer_reviews.text: EDIT -- i returned this as i realized it wasnt properly intergrated with my hub (you need to buy a separate hub honestly). 3/5. Just buy the phillips hue I was looking for a Phillips Hue but found this alternative. The app is a little tricky, especially when trying to connect to a Hub (you need a hub to connect to Alexa / Google / etc.) but once you get everything integrated, it’s a great lightbulb!
customer_reviews.author: David Li

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We've been wanting to 'jump in' to the smart home products for a while, but everything is so expensive. Finally I heard about these bulbs. We wanted something that integrated with google assistant, and these work amazingly! Installation was a breeze, voice commands are very intuitive. The only slight drawback is the limited 'routines" (not to be confused with google assistants routines") available by voice, but that is easily overcome by just saying a few more commands to set the lights the way you like. Great value for the price. We're working on swapping out all our bulbs for these because the price is great!.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Echo plus hub, not echo dot.
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up this will not work using an echo dot as a hub. Only the echo plus. I learned it after buying it. Don't be that guy. I was. Great product though. Sucks you have to download thier app then connect to Alexa. I wish Amazon would just start linking products better but that's not on the manufacturer. Also thier verification code is case sensitive if you are attempting to do it via mobile phone and don't copy paste. Your auto text will screw up the first letter.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Paired these with a Wink 2 hub. As soon as I plugged them in they went into pairing mode and adding them to Wink was a simple task. The lights remember the color you set when you turn them on, are bright, and look nice. The regular soft white has a good clean appearance. I put 2 inside and 2 outside and they all work well and respond quickly.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Teator

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Alexa Kids
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is selling this as a package with Alexa. But it does not work with the current Alexa skill. Alexa does to not consider the bulb as a smarthome device. UPDATE: Regular account works, child account does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Kervin

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs for a smart home
customer_reviews.text: I've been using sengled bulbs for a couple of years now, and they are wonderful to have! I use them in nearly every room of my house, and outside on my porch too. The sengled app is great for setting up scenes with multiple bulbs, and monitoring usage. I use them with an Amazon Echo so I can voice control them. A+ for price and functionality!
customer_reviews.author: The Most Wicked Witch

customer_reviews.title: Ok light bulb
customer_reviews.text: They are cool enough but can be a bit temperamental and have to be reset often. They have a wide array of colors but at the end of the day unless you are having a party most are unnecessary. I do like the purple a lot though as it’s easy on the eyes and makes for a good office light. I’d buy again eventually just not at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A Kean

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Wink
customer_reviews.text: I got this and didn't realize it had it's own hub... but luckily it doesn't need one if you already have a Wink so I didn't need one! Looks great, color range is similar to the Hue color lights I have. The only real difference is it doesn't dim quite as low as the Hue, but for the price difference I'm happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Jared James

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super simple and easy to use. Love the colors and brightness. Only small issues are that alexa doesn't recognize any of the themes I've set and if you loose internet for an extended period they do NOT reset to full brightness and white color like the Philips Hue does. So when I lost internet for 4 days they were stuck at 10%, it was terrible...
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a staple household items
customer_reviews.text: So the last smart bulb I'd got didn't change colours, just the brightness. This new smart bulb was a welcome addition to the hall, you need a hub to operate the bulbs, but it's worth the price because we can use upto 64 bulbs at once with the hub and the app. Can't wait to order more of these, and about the product, the colours might not be as bright, but they look great to form the party aesthetic. I really like that they also have the standard warm light presets, so you don't have to worry much about taking care of the lights during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Tejas

customer_reviews.title: HUB REQUIRED
customer_reviews.text: REQUIRES HUB in order to use the bulb with Alexa. When I bought this bulb, i bought it because the comments said NO HUB required. However, that is incorrect. You DO need a smartthings hub in order to use the bulb with Alexa. The bulb itself works good, feels solid, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Zman

customer_reviews.title: What a Wow experience..
customer_reviews.text: Saw it at a friend's place and the Kids were super excited so I went ahead with ordering the Bulb and the HUB. It was very easy to Install and in couple of minutes, I was using the APP to change the colors... Magical experience for the kids as they play with millions of colors. Thinking of ordering some more bulbs as the hib can support a large number like 64...
customer_reviews.author: Vinay Maheshwari

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The worst home electronics I have ever purchased. The bulb Always get unpaired and have to go through a lengty process it lasts one day and then have to do again. The “in app trouble shooting” conflicts with website. I am planning to throw them in the recycling bin. Ill jus get some regular bulbs. Do not buy! Also, the hulbs only provide sufficient lifht in one of the colors. On second thought. DO NOT BUY THIS WORTHLESS JUNK!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B. Fine

customer_reviews.title: Just as Good as Hue for Half the Price
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good alternative to hue for awhile. I've tried a few different brands and up until now, Hue RGB bulbs were by far the best for Alexa integration and features. Unfortunately they are expensive which is why these Sengled Smart LED Multicolor A19 bulbs are so awesome. They are half the price but offer easy Alexa integration just like Hue. The color reproduction is as good as the first generation of HUE RGB, but the latest HUE RGB bulbs offer superior color reproduction to Sengled. However, at half the price, Sengled Smart LED's are a superior value overall.
customer_reviews.author: Lander Ray Compton III

customer_reviews.title: White quit working
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 4 pack and synched them with my echo plus. all seemed to work for about 30 minutes. after that one of them stopped working in anything other than color mode. if switched to white it just shut off. re synched it and same problem. It appears that it lost its ability to do white.
customer_reviews.author: Waymore

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Super easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I bought it on a whim and I was kinda nervous based on the reviews say it was hard to setup Etc. But it was super easy. Basically installed the app, plugged the hub into the router, pressed next twice & everything was set up. I love having so much control over the lights in my room. Not just the color but the brightness. It can be really calming.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bulb for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bulb for my small den and its just bright enough for the space. I love that I can control it with my echo dot. I just ask Alexa to turn it ON/OFF, change colors, brightness and Alexa does the job. It was super easy to set up and use. I just use it with my existing Sengled hub. This is a simple no frills bulb for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K.REDD

customer_reviews.title: Good cost effective bulb
customer_reviews.text: Full on, it’s plenty bright; color rendering is spot on. Easy to setup with my SmartThings hub and works fine with my automations. I take one star off for not being as polished in transitioning- if you change brightness, color temp, or color it’s immediate and abrupt. Hue and LifX bulbs smoothly transition to new settings, which is more peaceful and certainly preferred. However, whether that transition is worth the extra cost is up to you and your application.
customer_reviews.author: swift770

customer_reviews.title: Repacements for Lightify bulbs in CA
customer_reviews.text: I had previously invested in Lightify bulbs, but because of the requirements in CA I can no longer buy them here! These bulbs seems to respond faster to commands and seem brighter than the Lightify bulbs. Hooked these up to a Wink 2 hub (it worked flawlessly if you follow the directions on Sengled's website) without issue. Also plan on moving these all to a Hubitat hub soon and I made sure these are compatible with that hub as well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pinkney

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, easy to set up, and so much fun
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Just buy them. They work seamlessly with both Alexa and Google. It’s color accuracy is amazing. The warm white and regular white are extremely bright. Colors aren’t as bright but are more than bright enough considering I only use color when I want to relax. In conclusion get em. It’s worth it. If u don’t want a hub get the Sengled bulb no hub. U won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Seun Olumurewa

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable, mood changing, and entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fun of changing colors with how I'm feeling right then. The colors Are brilliant in depth. The light itself could have more lumens for a brighter light but this works for almost any area one wants. Sengled setup was frustrating, but once I opened Alexa it was a breeze to finish setup then play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P

customer_reviews.title: Easy to configure, easy to use, works with Amazon Echo Plus and Alexa.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, for a 60 watt bulb, it's OK. However, it's noticeably darker when colored vs when full white, and as I was used to a 100W equivalent white LED, it's even dim in the evenings by comparison. HOWEVER, it does easily set up with Alexa and an Echo Plus without the need for Sengled's weird apps, and it integrates into that home automation setup. So all in all, it's an inexpensive way to get into home automation. I'd give it 5 stars if it was brighter at all colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Just amazed
customer_reviews.text: Sooo easy to install!!!! I love these bulbs and the brightness is perfect. The app is intuitive and fun to play with. You can have the colors change automatically, strobe and other fun options. I just bought two more bulbs for lamps in my living room. I will definitely have the whole collection eventually. If you are on the fence about these bulbs just buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great set of lights with wireless integration
customer_reviews.text: This set of lights and hub were the easiest i've ever installed! Literally 5 minutes from opening the box, I had these set up in my home. I use them with Google integration, and they work the first time and every time I need them. I've placed them on daily timers for waking up, and have not been disappointed. The colors are great, and I will be purchasing brighter bulbs for areas that need more light.
customer_reviews.author: LoU_Da_MaN

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I’m stupid or it’s hard to install
customer_reviews.text: Well, I spent about 2 hours fiddling with these lights until I realized that depending on the type of lightbulb you order, the way to re-initiate paring mode (which didn’t work the first time for me) was different and very specific. Not just turn it off and on again. User error I suppose... After FINALLY figuring out how to get them to pair I must say they are SO COOL!! The range of colors, options, and dimming features are amazing. And the smart hub was pretty easy to install which helps. The app is a little finicky but overall, besides my trouble with initial installation, they are really something special. Worth it for me!
customer_reviews.author: JulieB05

customer_reviews.title: Great for a cheaper price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a regular lamp using SmartThings hub and an Echo. So far they work great. Now if I can just get the family to stop chasing colors on me that would be great. Cheaper than Phillips but time will tell how long they last. You can even voice dim them which I really like when you don’t want too much light.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny M

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad smart bulb at all. Works really well, installs super easy and works with Alexa very well. My only issue is that it doesn’t have any color changing effects. If you want strobe lighting or any effects at all, these are not the ones to get. Hopefully in the future they will have that option. These bulbs are great and I’ve never had an issue with them. And you can’t really beat the price. But I had to return them because I was specifically looking for color changing lights with effects.
customer_reviews.author: Naeiri Aboolian

product_meta.title: Sengled Smart LED Multicolor A19 Starter Kit, 60W Equivalent, 2 Smart Light Bulbs & Hub, RGBW Color and Tunable White 2000-6500K, Works with Alexa & Google Assistant
product_meta.description: Do more with your lighting. Use the Sengled Smart LED Multicolor Starter kit to transform your space with a single tap in Sengled Home app (iOS/Android) or a simple voice command. Compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant, it's simple to add smart lighting in any room. Create scenes, change colors, set schedules, dim or brighten, and more with the app. With over 16 million colors and tunable whites to pick from, your lights can set the mood for everything from cozy movie nights to party vibes. Operating temperature - -4 to 104ºF (-20 to 40ºC)
feature_bullets: Smart Lighting: Get started by connecting the included Sengled Smart Hub to a 2.4 gigahertz wi fi network. Turn the lights on and off, dim or brighten and set schedules using the Sengled Home app (iOS/Android)
Voice Control: Connect your Smart LED Starter Kit to Alexa or Google Assistant and control your lights via voice commands
Set the Mood: Choose from over 16 million colors or whites (candlelight to daylight / 2000K to 6500K). Lights will automatically turn to the last setting used when turned back on
Create Scenes and Schedules: Set scenes, change colors or put your lights on a routine, whether at home or away
Expand Your Smart Lighting: The included Sengled Smart Hub supports up to 64 Sengled Smart LEDs, including Multicolor and White A19 bulbs, sold separately

specifications.Special Features: Works with Alexa, Instant On, Dimmable, 16 Million Color Output, Control up to 64 Bulbs, Wireless Hub, Energy Star Certified, 2000K - 6500K color temperature, Zigbee Smart Bulb
specifications.Included Components: 2 Smart LED Light Bulbs 1 Smart Hub 1 Ethernet Cable 1 Power Adapater
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars634 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
